page.title: 20OPINIONS OF BOTLEY
page.content:
Most people we spoke to said they really liked living in Botley.Although the main road is busy they still thought that Botley was a peaceful place to live in, though quite expensive.
The people who worked on this: Thornhill Middle School Paul Boyce Susan Croucher Lisa Gregory Claire Edmunds Angela Cameron Dominic Cooper Jason Poppleton Wayne Tansley Michael House Mark Ediss Leah Busuttil Nicholas Hyndman Michael Ordish Steven Hulbert Paul Chaffers Matthew Smith Barry Owen Jane Orsbourn Patrick Morgan. Heathfield Middle School
